sentences.en: A control system for a new diesel rotary distributor pump is here introduced.
sentences.cn: 这里介绍一种新型柴油机回转式分配泵的控制系统.

sentences.en: A rotary telephone has a wheel with holes for each number.
sentences.cn: 转盘式电话有个带眼的轮子.

sentences.en: And , activated carbon regeneration rotary furnace is transformed into vertical moving bed.
sentences.cn: 将活性炭回轿再生炉改造为立式移动床.

sentences.en: He has also received a meritorious service award from Rotary Down Under.
sentences.cn: 他也曾荣获澳纽扶轮地域杂志的有功服务奖.

sentences.en: Innovate but follow the Rotary rule, always with Integrity and honor.
sentences.cn: 创新但是跟随著扶轮规范, 永远是正直与荣誉.

sentences.en: It is the carrier of official communications to Rotary club officers.
sentences.cn: 它是国际扶轮与各扶轮社职员的正式沟通桥梁.

sentences.en: Most of these resources are available www . rotary . org.
sentences.cn: 这些资源的绝大部分都可以由国际扶轮网站上取得.

sentences.en: Pneumatic DTH ( Down - The - Hole ) hammer is one of main pneumatic percussive - rotary drilling equipments.
sentences.cn: 风动冲击器是气动冲击回转钻进的主要设备之一.

sentences.en: Rotary cutters need no screen, but produce consistent grain size , low powder contain.
sentences.cn: 滚齿刀具无需筛板, 粉碎颗粒度均匀,粉尘含量极少.

sentences.en: Rotary International accepts no responsibility for the content of any member publication.
sentences.cn: 国际扶轮对任何会员社出版品的内容一概不负任何责任.

sentences.en: Rotary International presidents can't have favorites among Rotary programs.
sentences.cn: 国际扶轮社长不能对某些扶轮计画有所偏好.

sentences.en: Rotary's primary responsibilities include fundraising, advocacy, and volunteer recruitment.
sentences.cn: 扶轮主要的责任包括了募款 、 倡导和招募义工.

sentences.en: the rotary movement of the helicopter blades
sentences.cn: 直升机螺旋桨叶的转动

sentences.en: This setup consists of a butterfly valve and a rotary electromechanical actuator.
sentences.cn: 这套装置由蝶阀和旋转电动驱动器组成.

sentences.en: This worksheet provides space for planning your Rotary Foundation seminar.
sentences.cn: 此一工作表提供空间让你规划扶轮基金研讨会.

sentences.en: Use of a rotary vacuum evaporator will expedite the concentration steps in the procedure.
sentences.cn: 使用一座旋转真空蒸发器将会加快操作手续的浓缩过程.
